subject: Hockey, Ice
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Skidmore College forward David Dupuis once dreamed of playing junior hockey in Quebec but was steered to a U.S. college by a former N.H.L. star.
snippet: Skidmore College forward David Dupuis once dreamed of playing junior hockey in Quebec but was steered to a U.S. college by a former N.H.L. star.
